```{css}
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  background-color: white;
  font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* We do not have a table of content so we can use the full width instead of 75% */
.col-md-9 {
  width: 100%;
}

h2 {
  font-size:16px;
  margin-right: 12px;

}

.right h2 {

margin-right: 0px;
margin-left: 12px;

}

/* The actual timeline (the vertical ruler) */
.timeline {
  display:block;
  position: relative;
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 120px auto;
}

/* The actual timeline (the vertical ruler) */
.timeline::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 2px;
  background-color: grey;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 75%;

}

/* Container around content */
.container_tl {
  position: relative;
  background-color: inherit;
 /* display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: auto auto; */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;

}

/* The actual content */
.content {
  /* grid-column: 1 / span 1; */
  position: relative;

}

 .connector {
 	/* grid-column: 2 / span 1; */
	/* width: 100%; */
    border-bottom: 1px solid grey;
    height: 24px;
    min-width: 100px;
    flex-grow: 1;

}

.container_tl.left {

	width: 75%;

}

/* The circles on the timeline */
.container_tl.left::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  right: -6px;
  background-color: grey;
  top: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1;
}


/* The circles on the timeline */
.container_tl.right::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  left: -4px;
  background-color: grey;
  top: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1;
}

.container_tl.right {
  width: 25%;
}

.container.right .connector {

width: 100px;
flex-grow: 0;

}


/* Place the container to the left */
.left {
  left: 0;
}

/* Place the container to the right */
.right {
  left: 75%;
}




/* Media queries - Responsive timeline on screens less than 730px wide */
@media screen and (max-width: 730px) {

  /* hide the timeline */
  .timeline::after {
   display:none
  }
  
  /* Full-width containers */
  .container_tl.left {
    width: 100%;
    padding:12px;
    left: 0;
  }
  
  /*hide the connectors */
  .connector {
    display: none;
  
  }
  
  /* hide the dots */
  .container_tl::before, .container_tl::after {
    display: none;
  }
  
  
  .container_tl.right {

    padding:12px;
    text-align: right;
    width: 75%;
    left: 20%;
  }

  .container_tl.right h2 {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .content {
  width: 100%;
  }
  
 
}
```


```{r}
library(jsonlite)

df <- fromJSON("../data.json")
```

```{r, results='asis'}
cat('<div class="timeline">')

for (i in seq_len(nrow(df))) {
  if (df[i, "class"] == "preprint") {
    cat('<div class="container_tl left">')
    cat('<div class="content">')
    cat('<h2><a href=', df[i, "url"], '>', df[i, "title"], '</a></h2>')
    cat('<p>', df[i, "authorString"], '</p>')
    cat('</div>')
    cat('<div class="connector"></div>')
    cat('</div>')
  } else if (df[i, "class"] == "event") {
    cat('<div class="container_tl right">')
    cat('<div class="connector"></div>')
    cat('<div class="content">')
    cat('<h2>', df[i, "title"], '</h2>')
    cat('</div>')
    cat('</div>')
  }

}

cat('</div>')
```
